fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: RECENDT is engaged in contacts with European Institutions concerning research and innovation policy especially in the context of "Horizon 2020" and related policy areas (ETPs, PPPs, work programs, projects).
organisation_name: Research Center for Non Destructive Testing GmbH (RECENDT)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
RECENDT is a research company, performing application oriented research in the field of Non-Destructive Testing for various industrial branches. Our target is, to enable industry for process optimization and for perfect quality in modern production ecosystems. 
Our work is done in collaborative research and development projects. Some of these projects are conducted in the European framework programmes, like H2020.
